column2: IDEA-146390 Modules generated from Maven sources named using artifact name

column3: This change adds configuration to the Maven project importer so that IntelliJ Modules can be named as per the name element in the corresponding pom, rather than the artifactId.
Main functional change starts on line 134 in MavenModuleNameMapper. The rest is plumbing to pass configuration in.
Hi @klikh, is this in a queue to be reviewed? If it won't be merged, then so be it, but it would be nice to have some closure :)

Hi @ignatov, I don't mind rebasing if this has a chance of going in - last comment from @vladsoroka on the associated youtrack issue suggested it wouldn't be: https://youtrack.jetbrains.com/issue/IDEA-146390#focus=streamItem-27-1799877-0-0
It's up to @vladsoroka; I don't know which January he's talking :)
